name: Mosquito Bite 3D
description:
The Mosquito Bite 3D is a hyper casual mobile game.In the game Mosquito Bite 3D, the player will become a mosquito,sting a certain part of the girl and Complete the progress bar on the right.have you been unable to suppress all kinds of excitement?

FEATURES:
- Drag the screen to freely control the mosquito flight direction.
- You have to chase blood in the dangerous world of humans to survive.
- Survival in this game, which is easy to play, is harder than you think.
- real mosquito sounds and Provide mute function
- Free control mosquito flight
- The 3D design is cute（Later versions add rich skins）
- Fun way to avoid the slap
